attributes.action: stop spending to much money on your body -i.e. braces, plastic surgery- and spend it on your health
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To many people nowadays are spending to much money on body beauty. I think having your ears pierced is quite enough, you dont need plastic surgery, it ruins everything about you, even your personallity! PLease sign to help get something done about it.

-Lulu-

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
